section.title: FIFO Interface
section.para: The modules uses only the cache to look up domains. If you want to add or delete a new prefix-domain pair you have to use FIFO commands. All changes made via FIFO are applied to database. The database is loaded only at SER start up time.
There are three FIFO commands to use with PDT.

listitem.para: pdt_add - add a new prefix-domain pair
pdt_list - list the prefixes and the domains

section.para: Example shell scripts for these commands are placed in './doc/' (pdt_fifo_add.sh, pdt_fifo_delete.sh, pdt_fifo_list.sh). More about, in the comments before the implementation of the functions, inside the 'pdt.c' file.
